title: Don't Waste Your Pretty: The Go-to Guide for Making Smarter Decisions in Life & Love
description: Don’t Waste Your Pretty is the much-anticipated dating and relationships manifesto from author, life coach and award-winning blogger Demetria L. Lucas. Demetria has interviewed thousands of men, advised hundreds of clients, and answered more than 38,000 dating and relationship queries on her popular Ask.Fm page, where real women submit anonymous questions and receive professional advice — for free! Demetria’s latest advice guide is a compilation of popular questions asked by clients and readers. Lucas delivers the advice in a knowledgeable and blunt manner, quickly solving dating and relationships dilemmas.
author: Demetria L. Lucas
